类 ColorManager

java.lang.Object
com.Shapeville.ColorManager
public class ColorManager extends Object
Centralises every colour constant used by Shapeville. Provides two coherent palettes -- normal and colour-blind friendly. A single static flag controls the active palette; UI components obtain colours only through the public getters so they switch automatically when the mode changes. The helper adaptColor(Color) maps any ad-hoc colour to a high-contrast alternative when colour-blind mode is on. The class is a pure static utility and must not be instantiated.

    adaptColor(Color originalColor)

    • setColorBlindMode

      public static void setColorBlindMode(boolean mode)
      Enables or disables the color-blind friendly palette.
      参数:
      mode - true to enable color-blind mode, false to use normal mode

    • isColorBlindMode

      public static boolean isColorBlindMode()
      Checks if color-blind mode is currently active.
      返回:
      true if color-blind mode is enabled, false otherwise

    • adaptColor

      public static Color adaptColor(Color originalColor)
      Re-maps colours that are not part of the predefined set into safer, high-contrast variants when colour-blind mode is on; otherwise returns the original colour.
      参数:
      originalColor - the color to be adapted
      返回:
      the adapted color for color-blind mode, or the original color if color-blind mode is off

    • getColorHex

      public static String getColorHex(Color color)
      Converts a Color object to its hexadecimal string representation.
      参数:
      color - the color to convert
      返回:
      the color encoded as a HEX string (e.g. "#ffa500")
